row.name: UC4RB_APP_FILTER_EXCLUDE#
row.xui:
<text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_APP_FILTER_EXCLUDEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Application exclude filter" tooltip="Defines which folders should be excluded from the application snapshot. If empty, no files are excluded. The directory itself with all subdirectories is excluded. You may use this parameter to exclude directories, which are changed regularly, like a tmp/, log folders." upper="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant>

If empty, no files are excluded. The directory itself with all subdirectories is excluded. You may use this parameter to exclude directories, which are changed regularly, like a tmp/, log folders.</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="regex"/> <entry name="required">0</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="multiline">0</entry> <entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> </properties> </text>

row.name: UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_MODE#
row.xui:
<combo alt="1" dynamic="0" enabled="1" fill="b" filter="0" focus="0" id="UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_MODEs.00" nl="1" quotes="" strict="1" text="Snapshot mode" tooltip="Defines which parts should be included in the snapshot: only application: only the application, without the server should be snapshotted. This is the default behaviour. only server: only the server part should be snapshotted. both: both the application and the server should be included in the snapshot." vtype="i"><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command owner="_self" owneraction="setsource" ownerparam="src|_dialog@src"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptcombolist" target="_self" targetaction="setlist" wait="0"/>
<properties> <entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.VARA.SNAPSHOT_MODE</entry> <entry name="text">Snapshot mode</entry> <entry name="quotes"/> <entry name="id">UC4RB_SNAPSHOT_MODEs.00</entry> <entry name="enabled">0</entry> <entry name="focus">0</entry> <entry name="tooltip">Defines which parts should be included in the snapshot: only application: only the application, without the server should be snapshotted. This is the default behaviour. only server: only the server part should be snapshotted. both: both the application and the server should be included in the snapshot.</entry> <entry name="dynamic">0</entry> <entry name="modifiable">1</entry> <entry name="initvalue"/> <entry name="customfield"/> <entry name="xmlkey"/> <entry name="xmlpath"/> <entry name="onchangereset"/> <entry name="resetable">1</entry> </properties> </combo>
